question: What are the fees?
answer: BCA fees are: ₹22,000 PA. BBA fees are: ₹19,000 PA. MBA fees are: ₹24,000 PA.

question: What are the BCA fees?
answer: BCA (Bachelor of Computer Applications) fees are ₹22,000 annually. This is a 3-year program that focuses on computer science and programming.

question: What are the BBA fees?
answer: BBA (Bachelor of Business Administration) fees are ₹19,000 annually. This 3-year program covers management, finance, and business studies.

question: What are the MBA fees?
answer: MBA (Master of Business Administration) fees are ₹24,000 annually. This 2-year postgraduate program specializes in advanced management and business strategy.

question: What are the timing?
answer: BCA: 10:00AM to 5:00PM. BBA: 9:00AM to 3:00PM. MBA: 6:00AM to 11:00AM.

question: What is the BCA timing?
answer: BCA classes are held from 10:00 AM to 5:00 PM with lunch breaks. The timing is flexible to accommodate working professionals.

question: What is the BBA timing?
answer: BBA classes are held from 9:00 AM to 3:00 PM. Some evening batches are also available.

question: What is the MBA timing?
answer: MBA classes are held from 6:00 PM to 9:00 PM on weekdays and optional weekend sessions.

question: When does admission start?
answer: Admissions typically start from June every year. Early bird registrations often open in May. Apply online or visit the campus for more details.

question: What documents are required for admission?
answer: Required documents include: 10th & 12th marksheets, graduation degree (for postgraduate), valid ID proof, passport-size photos (4), and completed application form.

question: What is the college location?
answer: Prin. K.P. MIM is located in 156-B, Railway lines, Dufferin Chowk, Solapur, Maharashtra-413001

question: What are the eligibility criteria?
answer: BCA/BBA eligibility: 12th pass. Minimum 50% marks required. Entrance exam or merit-based selection.

question: What are the eligibility criteria for BCA?
answer: BCA eligibility: 12th pass with Mathematics/Science. Minimum 50% marks required. Entrance exam or merit-based selection.

question: What are the eligibility criteria for BBA?
answer: BBA eligibility: 12th pass from any stream. Minimum 45% marks required. Merit-based admission.

question: What are the eligibility criteria for MBA?
answer: MBA eligibility: Bachelor's degree with minimum 50% marks. GMAT/CAT score (optional but recommended). 2-3 years work experience preferred.

question: Does the college provide hostel facilities?
answer: No! sorry college don't provide hostel facilities.

question: What are the placement opportunities?
answer: We have strong placement records with partnerships from top IT companies, corporations, and startups. 90%+ placement rate for eligible candidates.

question: What is the scholarship policy?
answer: We offer merit-based scholarships up to 50% fee waiver for top scorers. Need-based assistance available. Contact the finance office for details.

question: How can I contact the college?
answer: Contact the admissions office at: Email: admissions@kpmim.edu | Phone: +91-02172317964 | Or visit the campus during office hours (9 AM - 5 PM).

question: What are the available specializations in BCA?
answer: BCA specializations: Web Development, Mobile App Development, Software Development Database Management.

question: Does the college have a computer lab?
answer: Yes, we have computer labs with latest software, high-speed internet, and 24/7 access for students.

question: Are there any clubs or societies?
answer: Yes! We have various clubs including coding club, debate society, cultural club, sports committee, and technical workshops.

question: What is the library facility?
answer: Our library has 5000+ books, online journals, e-books, and digital resources. Open from 10 AM to 4 PM daily with free access to all students.

question: Can I get a fee payment plan?
answer: Contact the finance office in our college.

question: What is the faculty qualification?
answer: All faculty members hold Master's degrees from reputed universities with 5+ years of industry/academic experience. Continuous professional development encouraged.

question: Is there an online application process?
answer: Yes, apply online through our website. The process is simple: fill the form, upload documents, pay application fee, and submit. You'll receive confirmation via email.

question: What is the course curriculum?
answer: Our curriculum is designed as per industry standards and updated regularly. It includes practical projects, internships, and real-world case studies.

question: Do you offer internship programs?
answer: Yes, mandatory internships are part of the curriculum. We partner with leading companies for summer and semester-long internship opportunities.

question: What is the cut-off for admission?
answer: Cut-offs vary yearly based on applications. Generally, BCA: 60%+, BBA: 55%+, MBA: 50%+. Top scorers get priority and scholarship consideration.

question: Are there evening classes available?
answer: No! there are no evening classes.

question: How do I prepare for admission?
answer: Focus on your 12th/graduation subjects. Our college also conducts entrance exams. Join coaching centers or use online resources for entrance test preparation.

question: What is the student-to-faculty ratio?
answer: We maintain a 1:20 student-to-faculty ratio ensuring personalized attention and quality education for every student.

question: Are there sports facilities?
answer: No! threr are no sports facilities.

question: What are the career prospects after BCA?
answer: BCA graduates work as Software Developers, Web Developers, Data Analysts, System Administrators, and IT Consultants with average salaries starting at ₹3-5 LPA.

question: How long is the BCA program?
answer: BCA is a 3-year full-time program with 6 semesters. Each semester is 6 months long.

question: Is there industrial training?
answer: Yes, industrial training and workshops are conducted regularly by industry experts and leading tech companies.

question: Can I pursue higher studies after graduation?
answer: Absolutely! Our graduates can pursue MBA.
